name: AloneEscape
description:
A game all about escape.

Alone Escape is a very short game based on escaping a house.
Contains only one ending.

You found yourself lying on the floor in the bathroom.
Your head pains.

This is just a project of a beginner in renpy.

Game art is of a begginer.

Comment if you have any suggestions how to improve the game.

CREDITS

code/art/story by kick14/Kshitij

Title music by MARCUS music
